arChildNodes.szComment: Ogai tells players of his frustration--the dead ignoring his demands. He's clearly at wits end.
Frustrated, Ogai speaks to the "privilege" the honored dead had in knowing the Grinning One
Ogai angrily insults the dead around him, brimming with resentment/anger.
Ogai speaks to inhaling the honored dead's bone dust to learn their secrets, but hearing nothing in return. His frustration is making him feel helpless.
Ogai returns to anger/resentment, blaming the dead for his failings
Ogai turns positive/hopeful, believing the player may be able to help him learn the secrets from "proper" bone dust.
